name: Jiexiu Zuozegou Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Jiexiu Xinyugou Zuozegou Coal Industry Company

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E4%BB%8B%E4%BC%91%E9%91%AB%E5%B3%AA%E6%B2%9F%E5%B7%A6%E5%88%99%E6%B2%9F%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Jiexiu Zuozegou Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Hongyawan Village, Lianfu Town, Jiexiu City, Jinzhong City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Jiexiu Xinyugou Zuozegou Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: Shanxi Jiexiu Xinyugou Zuozegou Coal Industry operates the mine and is fully owned by Shanxi Luxin Energy Group.
